thread.title: Video: Fire Ants Create Floating Rafts to Avoid S.C. Flooding
thread.title_full: Video: Fire Ants Create Floating Rafts to Avoid S.C. Flooding

title: Video: Fire Ants Create Floating Rafts to Avoid S.C. Flooding
text:
Subscribe Video: Fire Ants Create Floating Rafts to Avoid S.C. Flooding In video captured by WSAV-TV, thousands of ants appeared to pile atop each other in "floating islands in Dorchester County, S.C. October 6, 2015 As South Carolina continues to recover from record-setting rainfall and subsequent flooding, fire ant displacement has become a new issue. In video captured by WSAV-TV, thousands of ants appeared to pile atop each other in "floating islands in Dorchester County, S.C.," the station reports.
